ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hi, I'm a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Leipzig...
ABOUT_ME.HIGHLIGHT_1: Flexible in terms of working environments...
ABOUT_ME.HIGHLIGHT_2: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges...
ABOUT_ME.HIGHLIGHT_3: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code...

TECHNOLOGIES.TITLE: Technologies
TECHNOLOGIES.INTRO: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
TECHNOLOGIES.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: A task management tool inspired by Kanban for creating and organizing tasks easily.

EL_POLLO_LOCO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: A 2D jump 'n' run game with animations and various enemies.

DA_BUBBLE.TITLE: Da Bubble
DA_BUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: A real-time chat app with a Firebase backend and Angular.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

COMMENTS.USER_1: Dennis is a very dedicated Frontend Developer who always works with great passion on projects.
COMMENTS.USER_2: He is very helpful and always has a solution ready when problems arise.
COMMENTS.USER_3: His creative approach and technical knowledge enrich every project.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact me
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.CALL_TO_ACTION: Need a Frontend developer? Let's talk!

FORM.NAME_TITLE: Only letters and spaces are allowed.
FORM.PRIVACY_POLICY: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
